website_summaries.verdict: Once you get past the break-in period, this tennis shoe is durable and built for movements that advance your game without breaking your budget.
pros: An affordable tennis shoe that is comfortable once broken in
Gel cushioning in the forefoot absorbs shock
Offers high levels of comfort and stability
cons: Some owners recommend breaking them in before taking to the court to prevent blisters and increase flexibility

customer_reviews.title: Now wearing my third pair of these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying shoes, especially tennis shoes. What fits good in the story often doesn't quite make the grade once you take them home and have worn them long enough to know "Oops," but too long to return them. These Asic's were first bought in the sporting goods store. After a couple of weeks of wearing them, I decided to be smart this time. I went on Amazon looking for exactly the same brand, size, model, etc. and bought two more pair. Now I'm good to go for a couple of years! Because these really work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daze

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Aerobics, Good Fit for Me
customer_reviews.text: This is the newer version of a shoe I’ve worn in the past. I use them for aerobics class. The gel offers good padding under the forefoot. The main draw for me is the fit. My foot is narrow and these are somewhat narrow. I also wear a 12.5 which doesn’t exist according to most manufacturers. I used to get these in a 12 which fit, so they were a large 12. Now they actually mark them as 12.5.
customer_reviews.author: jayb

customer_reviews.title: No longer the same fit as years past--bad for the toes
customer_reviews.text: I have wore this brand and style for over 15 years and until this pair, no problem. But the design now has changed and my left foot developed a terrible issue with one of my toes. I had to abandon the shoes, which is too bad as I like the brand and style.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Good ankle support which is critical for pickleball. A bit tight but that will change with use. Looks good, feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jph

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were delivered on time. They were great at the start, but the arch support seemed to wear down really fast. If you are on your feet a lot I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Use for playing Pickleball. Toe pain has gone away. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: ShankMaster

customer_reviews.title: SMALL AND NARROW
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is small and narrow, and shoe laces are short. Order at least a half-size larger.
customer_reviews.author: LGM

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great court athletic shoe. Fits true (11.5), immediately comfortable, great overall feel and support
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Fan of ASICS shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Asics shoes so when I see them on sales I order them. Have not been disappointed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tennis shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Been playing with them for a couple of weeks now. Not that I'm putting them under the stress of very aggressive rallies, but I feel pretty good when making short slides and sudden changes of direction.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Gorriz

customer_reviews.title: good court shoe
customer_reviews.text: I play pickle ball 3x a week and this is an excellent court shoe. very light, good fit, and a great price
customer_reviews.author: marzman

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoe for the money !
customer_reviews.text: Best tennis shoe for the $$$ ... $50 or less with great sole and support ... ASICS best deal !
customer_reviews.author: raleigh b smith

customer_reviews.title: Great court shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes while playing Pickle ball. Great support well made
customer_reviews.author: Juju5645

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They look good and appear to be well made. If you have narrow heels like I do, this shoe is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: temperich

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for more narrow shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They fit more narrow feet really well. The only downside is that they don't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for outdoor pickleball. I normally buy a 11.5 but I wanted a snug fit because of the side to side movement when playing. I have a narrow foot and these are a perfect fit. No comfort issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are comfortable and perform and wear well
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable and perform and wear well. I have had problems with wearing out toes with other brands. Not with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hardcastle

customer_reviews.title: very nice sneakers, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: very nice sneakers, reasonable price. Great for my level of tennis. A bit snug but I'm sure they will loosen up quickly
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe but didn't fit me.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was as expected and arrived when promised it just didn't fit my difficult foot, high instep and wide at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Don Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit just a bit wide in the toes...and they could be lighter. But otherwise I like them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Toepfer

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable and has performed well. I use it fo pickleball and happy so far with the purchase. I find the shoe to run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Obone

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a narrow tennis shoe and the run on ...
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a narrow tennis shoe and the run on the narrow side. Others may find them narrower then normal. Little wide in the heel, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: peachy keen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish the back was higher and the soles more flexible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: They run small. If I hadn’t worn I’d send back
customer_reviews.author: karl i.

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: They look ok they fit good I have not used them yet so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Hard to please

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I could've used a little more support, but I know this was a cheaper model.
customer_reviews.author: jderosa

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my husband. He wears a size ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He wears a size 7 which is difficult to find in the stores. These arrived as expected, fit perfectly n loves playing in them.
customer_reviews.author: snook

customer_reviews.title: Sizing!
customer_reviews.text: If you are between sizes go up a size. Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Buerkle

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical Asics fit
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Asics running shoes for years, partly because I like the fit and partly because the fit is predictable. Earlier in the year I bought a pair of indoor volleyball shoes for pickleball, and they fit as expected. I really like them. Before ordering the Gel-Dedicate 5, I read the Amazon reviews and noticed that several buyers thought the shoe was narrow. Still, with my Asics history, I went ahead and ordered. They ARE narrow and not especially comfortable. Also, the sole seems to be wearing faster than I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Mac

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine for the $ but I miss not having LEATHER SHOES....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well designed shoes with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the shoes and found them to be well priced, nice looking and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoe for the price. very happy with it. fits well and is comfortable. would definitley buy again
customer_reviews.author: Allister

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes do not fit like a D width. Way to narrow at the ball of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have always liked the gel heel product and these are really nice. Great buying experience
customer_reviews.author: Dennis N Swingle

customer_reviews.title: Not a foot-shaped shoe
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit like other ASICS at all. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So far fine
customer_reviews.text: One time wear so far. I ordered 1/2 size larger than normal fit and seem comfortable. For leisure use NOT athletic activities. I buy specialized ( more $$$ ) for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Dedicate 5
product_meta.description: The gel-dedicate® 5 shoe is ideal for new recreational tennis players, featuring our forefoot gel® cushioning system, solid rubber outsole, and flexible upper design. This shoe softens impact of abrupt movements and delivers full-match comfort.
feature_bullets: Solid Rubber Outsole: Provides enhanced durability and traction.
Forefoot GEL Cushioning System: Enhances shock attenuation during propulsion.
Trusstic System Technology: Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoe.
